member.name: T:Infragistics.Olap.Excel.ExcelDataConnectionSettings
member.summary: Used by to open and use Excel files as data source.
member.remarks: Setting the property will initiate processing of the data found in the file so it's important to have and or properties set first. When is not specified then default "ExcelData" value will be used for that type name. For each row found in the excel's sheet specified by or will be generated instances of type specified by and list will be updated with these instances and then event is fired.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Olap.Excel.ExcelDataConnectionSettings.#cctor
member.summary: Initializes static members of the class. Registers class in OlapContainer.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Olap.Excel.ExcelDataConnectionSettings.AddExcelCellFormatMapping(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Maps given excel cell format string to format string that will be used when data is visualized.
member.param: The format string used by the system.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Olap.Excel.ExcelDataConnectionSettings.AddExcelDateTimeCellFormatMapping(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Maps given excel datetime cell format string to format string that will be used when data is visualized.
member.param: The excel datetime cell format string.
The format string used by the system.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Olap.Excel.ExcelDataConnectionSettings.GetValueFormat(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the format string registered for given excel cell format string.
member.returns: The actual format string that is used when data is visualized.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Olap.Excel.ExcelDataConnectionSettings.GetDateTimeValueFormat(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the format string registered for given datetime excel cell format string.
member.param: The excel cell datetime format string.
member.returns: >The actual format string that is used when data is visualized.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Olap.Excel.ExcelDataConnectionSettings.RemoveExcelCellFormatMapping(System.String)
member.summary: Remove the mappings for given excel cell format string.
member.param: The excel cell format string that is unregistered.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Olap.Excel.ExcelDataConnectionSettings.RemoveExcelDateTimeCellFormatMapping(System.String)
member.summary: Remove the mappings for given excel datetime cell format string.
member.param: The excel datetime cell format string that is unregistered.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.Excel.ExcelDataConnectionSettings.ItemsSource
member.summary: Gets the collection of the items source.
member.remarks: This collection is generated internally based on the data extracted form the .

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.Excel.ExcelDataConnectionSettings.FileStream
member.summary: Gets or sets of the excel file. Setting this property will initiate processing of the data found in the file. For each row found in the excel's sheet specified by or will be generated instances of type specified by and list will be updated with these instances and then event is fired.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.Excel.ExcelDataConnectionSettings.WorksheetName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the worksheet that is opened. Is takes precedence over property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.Excel.ExcelDataConnectionSettings.WorksheetIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the worksheet that is opened.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Olap.Excel.ExcelDataConnectionSettings.GeneratedTypeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name that is used for dynamically created class for the data extracted from the excel's file.
